attributes.text:
This class comes with all relevant information regarding the client’s operating system. This class is examining the userAgent of the browser’s build-in navigator object. Currently there are more than 4000 (in words: four thousand) different userAgent strings, so this class aims to target only the relevant ones. However this list is not meant to be complete.

The listed constants are automatically filled on the initialization phase of the class. The defaults listed in the API viewer need not to be identical to the values at runtime.
since 1.4: Please use qx.core.Environment.get() instead.
* {Boolean} Flag to detect if the client system is Windows 95   *
since 1.4: Please use qx.core.Environment.get() instead.
